com.percussion.services.sitemgr
Interface IPSSite

All Superinterfaces:
IPSCatalogIdentifier, IPSCatalogSummary, Serializable
public interface IPSSite
extends IPSCatalogSummary

Represents a publishing site. Sites are primarily cataloged through the site manager in rhino. The site manager performs all CRUD operations on site objects.

Author:
dougrand

getGlobalTemplate

String getGlobalTemplate()
Get the global template name for the site. If the site is using velocity this will be interpreted as the template name, for old style assemblers this will be used as is for the xsl file name. It is possible to then have both a template and a file and support both - although it may look a little silly to register a velocity based template with foo.xsl as the name.

Returns:
Returns the globalTemplate, may be null or empty

setGlobalTemplate

void setGlobalTemplate(String globalTemplate)
Parameters:
globalTemplate - The globalTemplate to set, may be null or empty

getUnpublishFlags

String getUnpublishFlags()
Get the un-publishing flags. It is one or more characters corresponding to content valid flags used in the workflow, multiples should be separated by commas.

Returns:
the flags described above, never null. It defaults to 'u' if not specified.

setUnpublishFlags

void setUnpublishFlags(String flags)
Sets the un-publishing flags.

Parameters:
flags - the new flags, never null or empty. It is one or more characters corresponding to content valid flags used in the workflow, multiples should be separated by commas.
See Also:
getUnpublishFlags()

getGUID

IPSGuid getGUID()
Get the unique id for the site. Legacy sites will not have a truly unique id.

Specified by:
getGUID in interface IPSCatalogIdentifier
Returns:
the guid, never null

getAllowedNamespaces

String getAllowedNamespaces()
The allowed namespaces is a comma separated list of namespaces that can be used in this site. The list is intersected with the configured namespaces for the Rhythmyx server. If a namespace is not configured, then including the prefix here will have no affect.

Returns:
Returns the allowedNamespaces, may be null or empty

setAllowedNamespaces

void setAllowedNamespaces(String allowedNamespaces)
Parameters:
allowedNamespaces - a comma separated list to set, may be null or empty

getAssociatedTemplates

Set<IPSAssemblyTemplate> getAssociatedTemplates()
Get the modifiable set of associated templates for this site.

Returns:
a set of associated templates, never null

copy

void copy(IPSSite site)
Copy the all properties from the given site except the ID and the version of the site.

Parameters:
site - the source site, may not be null.
